roleset.name: mess with
roleset.note: MESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mess' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Bungling (mess up). (from mess.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: don't mess with Texas
example.text: Should they-1, too, stop [*-1] ``messing with'' his free market?

roleset.name: make a mess of, messed_up: screwed up, not right
roleset.note: MESSED_UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, mess-v.02. (from messed.01-j)

example.name: now that's clever
example.text: He said the Chaos Computer Club, of West Germany, once managed to invade SPAN and do such things as change the value of pi, [*] messing up some calculations.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Our distribution of aid is really messed up tbh .
